title: Somalia Asks U.S. to Step Up Drone Strikes Against Qaeda-Linked Fighters
description: A new administration in Somalia has launched an offensive against Al Shabab, which are also facing an uprising from local militias.
dc:creator: Charlie Savage, Eric Schmitt and Abdi Latif Dahir
category: United States Defense and Military Forces
media:description: Shabab fighters outside Mogadishu, Somalia, in 2008. The Somali government wants U.S. military operators to be able to attack groups of Shabab militants who might pose a threat to Somali forces.
